message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I could come down to $110, but that's my best price.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
